alert.note: Alert for Sullivan (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 15 at 8:35PM EDT until July 15 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 PM EDT FOR CENTRAL SULLIVAN COUNTY... At 834 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Muncy Valley, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Dushore, Laporte, Forksville and Eagles Mere. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
